product.title: Simba and Nala Help Bomo | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Simba and Nala Help Bomo

Beloved characters from the acclaimed Disney film The Lion King make a heroic appearance in this richly illustrated book that’s sure to delight young readers. Lion cubs Simba and Nala put aside their competitive feelings and join forces to rescue baby elephant Bomo, who is stuck in mud. Teamwork, camaraderie, and the development of keen problem-solving skills are prominent themes in this tale.

Tie-in Activity: Engage your child in a teamwork activity by tackling an especially difficult task together, such as raking leaves or cleaning out the garage. Encourage her to brainstorm for ideas and suggestions to make the chore easier.
